name: Subway Surfers for PC
description:
Port from android to PC.

Controls are performed by sliding the clamped mouse across the screen and on the keyboard arrows.

At the beginning of the race you have to bump into something to make the policeman get away, you can bump and hit anything an unlimited number of times.

Due to the port from the phone game has a high degree of rotation of the camera, unfortunately this can not be corrected.

Sometimes the character can start messing around on its own, this is corrected by restarting the run.
